name: dumbwhois
description: DumbWhoIs is a web utility for performing WHOIS lookups on domain names from a self-hosted instance. It exposes a simple form and response view, allowing users to query domain registration data without third-party services.

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Run queries from your own server to avoid sharing search history with external providers

features.title: Raw Data Display
features.description: View complete WHOIS responses with all available fields for technical analysis

features.title: No Rate Limits
features.description: Perform unlimited queries without restrictions imposed by public WHOIS websites

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Run as a single container with minimal resource requirements for personal or team use

features.title: REST API
features.description: Integrate WHOIS lookups into scripts or applications using simple HTTP endpoints
